title: Thermodynamically controlled chemical regeneration of spent battery cathodes using recyclable electron donors under ambient conditions
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4064-4077
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04528E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sunghyun Ko, Jinkwan Choi, Jihyun Hong, Changsoo Kim, Uichan Hwang, Minhyung Kwon, Gukhyun Lim, Seok Su Sohn, Jinha Jang, Ung Lee, Chan Beum Park, Minah Lee
We establish thermodynamically controlled Li-coupled electron transfer from recyclable electron donors to cathodes as a viable route for directly regenerating spent cathodes under ambient conditions.
